name: Irish Soda Bread
description: You don’t need to be Irish to make this rustic, no-yeast bread! All of its leavening action comes from baking soda and buttermilk! This easy recipe requires no rise time and yields a deliciously crusty and moist loaf, ideal for dunking into stews!

ingredients.name: French Onion Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Combine flours, oats, wheat germ, dip mix, salt and baking soda.
Using a pastry blender, cut butter into dry ingredients until a coarse meal results.
Add buttermilk, stir quickly and turn out onto a floured surface. Knead gently and form into a loaf. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Dust with a little whole-wheat flour and cut a shallow X into the centre. Bake for 30 minutes.
tips: This recipe can be easily doubled to make 2 round, rustic loaves.

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savory dish where you’d like to liven up the flavur with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
